thread.title: Irrfan Khan invited Deepika Padukone to watch 'Talvar'
thread.title_full: Irrfan Khan invited Deepika Padukone to watch 'Talvar' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Irrfan Khan invited Deepika Padukone to watch 'Talvar'
text:
Piku co-stars Irrfan and Deepika Padukone share a warm camaraderie and mutual respect for each other.
READ: President Pranab Mukherjee to watch 'Talvar'
Listen to songs of Talvar on Gaana.com
For the last few days, Deepika has been keenly following the reactions to Meghna Gulzar's investigative thriller Talvar , that has Irrfan, Konkona Sensharma and Neeraj Kabi in the lead. Naturally, she was keen to see the film. Irrfan organised a special screening for Deepika at a suburban preview theatre on Wednesday night. The actor couldn't be present because he was slightly unwell, but Deepika kept her date with the movie.
 updates
WATCH: Neeraj Kabi was troubled during the shoot of Talvar - TOI
